comments.body: this does change the behavior such that `store_uri = ""` is not a legit URI anymore. that seems okay - could it maybe affect a plug-in that is defined with `uri = ""`? maybe...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@        """
        from mlflow.tracking._model_registry import utils
        store_uri = utils._resolve_registry_uri(store_uri)
        builder = self.get_store_builder(store_uri)
        return builder(store_uri=store_uri)
